snippets.description: Save frequently used code snippets for quick access.

advanced.executionEnvironmentTooltip: Choose between Node.js (WebContainer) for backend/server features or Browser (DOM) for frontend features.
advanced.showTopLevel: Show the result of each top-level expression
advanced.alignTooltip:
Output results will be placed on the same line as their source.
Disable this to show output results in their natural order of execution.
advanced.logLevelTooltip: Define the detail level of internal system logs for debugging (GlobalScheduler, AsyncEngine).
advanced.showTopLevelTooltip: Shows results of top-level expressions to see intermediate values.
advanced.showUndefinedTooltip: If enabled, 'undefined' values will be explicitly shown in the output. If disabled, they will be hidden to clean up the view.
advanced.loopProtectionTooltip: Stops execution if infinite loops or long scripts are detected.
advanced.magicCommentsTooltip: Enable special comments like //? for inline debugging.
advanced.autoRunAfterInstallTooltip: Automatically re-run code after missing packages are installed.
advanced.autoInstallPackagesTooltip: Automatically install missing packages when detected in imports. Disable to install packages manually.

npm.description: Manage npm packages for your code. Packages are automatically installed when detected in imports.

info.title: How it works:
info.auto: Packages are automatically detected from import statements
info.install: They are installed on first code execution
info.manual: You can also manually add packages here
info.webcontainer: All packages run in an isolated WebContainer environment
